name.description: Identifies the name of the asset that the SBT represents

description.description: Describes the asset to which this NFT represents

memberOf.description: Identifies the name of the organization to which the owner of the SBT is affiliated

role.description: Identifies the role in the organization of the SBT owner

image.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this SBT represents. Consider making any images at a width between 320 and 1080 pixels and aspect ratio between 1.91:1 and 4:5 inclusive.
